core.hotreload: [MapModifiers] Hot-Reloaded! Changes will take effect next map!
core.defaultconfig: [MapModifiers] Found no map-specific configuration for {mapName}, using default one!
core.noconfig: [MapModifiers] No map-specific configuration for {mapName} or default one found. Skipping!
spawnpoints.error.exists: [MapModifiers] WARNING: spawn point already exists at that position. Skipping!
spawnpoints.error.nospawns: [MapModifiers] WARNING: {mapName} has no configured spawns for {type}, but according to configuration the original spawns shall be removed.
spawnpoints.created: [MapModifiers] created spawn point for {type} at {origin} with angle {angle}
spawnpoints.count.warning: [MapModifiers] WARNING: Only {count} spawn points for {players} players!
spawnpoints.marker.exists: [MapModifiers] WARNING: spawn point marker already exists at that position. Skipping!
